Long Description: Chicken Mandi is widely regarded as a delicious and flavorful dish. It is known for its rich, aromatic spices and the tender, well-marinated chicken.The blend of spices, including cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, and others, gives Chicken Mandi its distinctive taste. Additionally, the combination of the creamy tomato-based sauce, tender chicken, and fluffy rice creates a harmonious and savory flavor profile.
